description:
The Telepathy Club is told that they are going to be shut down by the student council due to lack of members. It was then that one of the members, Inukawa, thought of possibly getting Mob to join. However, Mob gets a call from Reigen about taking care of an incident at Highso Girls` Academy...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aoi Haru no Gimon: Noukan Denpa Bu Toujou
Doubts About Youth: The Telepathy Club Appears
Doutes d’ado ~ Entrée du club des télépathes ~
青い春の疑問 ~脳感電波部登場~
